Package com.ownsprojects.ecomerce.security

Class SecurityConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ownsprojects.ecomerce.security.SecurityConfig
  • @Configuration
@EnableGlobalMethodSecurity(prePostEnabled=true)
public class SecurityConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration class for setting up security in the application.

        Defines the security filter chain for the application.
        Parameters:
        httpSecurity - The HttpSecurity object to configure security settings.
        authenticationManager - The AuthenticationManager for handling authentication.
        Returns:
        A SecurityFilterChain instance for configuring security filters.

        java.lang.Exception - If there is an exception while configuring security.
